src:
Unai Emery: Inilah Mesut Ozil yang Diinginkan Semua Orang
02 Nov 2019, 08:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery membuka pintu lebar-lebar bagi Mesut Ozil untuk kembali menjadi pemain utama Arsenal. Pelatih asal Spanyol itu telah melihat banyak hal positif darinya dan mengaku akan memberinya kesempatan tampil di Premier League.
Ozil sempat diturunkan sejak menit awal saat Arsenal bertemu Liverpool dalam laga babak 16 besar Carabao Cup, Kamis (31/10/2019) dini hari. Pria berkebangsaan Jerman itu tampil dengan cukup baik dan sukses menyumbangkan assist.
Perlu diketahui bahwa itu adalah laga ketiga Ozil di semua kompetisi pada musim ini. Dalam beberapa kesempatan, Emery enggan memberi menit bermain kepada mantan penggawa Real Madrid tersebut karena merasa ada pemain lain yang pantas untuk diturunkan.
Namun Emery mulai melunak. Menjelang laga melawan Wolverhampton di ajang Premier League, ia mengatakan bahwa dirinya memiliki rencana untuk membawanya kembali beraksi dalam kompetisi bergengsi di tanah Inggris tersebut.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Unai Emery: This is Mesut Ozil Everyone Wants
02 Nov 2019, 08:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery opened the door wide for Mesut Ozil to return to being Arsenal's main player. The Spaniard has seen many positive things from him and claimed he would give him a chance to appear in the Premier League.
Ozil had been revealed since the early minutes when Arsenal met Liverpool in the last 16 Carabao Cup match on Thursday (10/31/2019) morning. The German man performed quite well and successfully donated assists.
Please note that it is Ozil's third match in all competitions this season. On several occasions, Emery was reluctant to give minutes of playing to the former Real Madrid employee because he felt there were other players who deserved to be demoted.
But Emery began to soften. Ahead of the match against Wolverhampton in the Premier League, he said that he had plans to bring him back into action in this prestigious competition on British soil.

Scroll down to read full information.
